Package agh.alleviation.service

Class MovieService

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.service.EntityObjectService<Movie,​MovieRepository>
agh.alleviation.service.MovieService
@Service
public class MovieService
extends EntityObjectService<Movie,​MovieRepository>
Service responsible for manipulating the movie repository.
Author:
Anna Nosek
